cat << 'ENDOFFILE' > train_and_predict.py
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
from xgboost import XGBClassifier

# 1. Load data
train_path = 'data/train.csv'
test_path = 'data/test.csv'
train_df = pd.read_csv(train_path)
test_df = pd.read_csv(test_path)
test_passenger_ids = test_df['PassengerId']

# 2. Combine data for feature engineering
full_df = pd.concat([train_df, test_df], sort=False).reset_index(drop=True)

# 3. Feature Engineering
# 3.1 Extract Title from Name
full_df['Title'] = full_df['Name'].str.extract(' ([A-Za-z]+)\.', expand=False)
# Simplify titles
title_map = {
    'Mlle':'Miss', 'Ms':'Miss', 'Mme':'Mrs', 'Lady':'Royal', 'Countess':'Royal', 'Dona':'Royal',
    'Dr':'Officer', 'Rev':'Officer', 'Col':'Officer', 'Major':'Officer', 'Capt':'Officer', 'Sir':'Royal',
    'Jonkheer':'Royal', 'Don':'Royal'
}
full_df['Title'] = full_df['Title'].replace(title_map)
rare_titles = ['Royal', 'Officer']
full_df['Title'] = full_df['Title'].where(full_df['Title'].isin(['Mr','Mrs','Miss','Master']), other='Rare')

# 3.2 Family size features
full_df['FamilySize'] = full_df['SibSp'] + full_df['Parch'] + 1
full_df['IsAlone'] = (full_df['FamilySize'] == 1).astype(int)

# 3.3 Ticket group size
ticket_counts = full_df['Ticket'].value_counts()
full_df['TicketGroupSize'] = full_df['Ticket'].map(ticket_counts)

# 3.4 Cabin letter
full_df['CabinLetter'] = full_df['Cabin'].fillna('Unknown').str[0]

# 3.5 Fare per person
full_df['FarePerPerson'] = full_df['Fare'] / full_df['FamilySize']

# 4. Handle missing values
# Embarked
full_df['Embarked'].fillna(full_df['Embarked'].mode()[0], inplace=True)
# Fare (only 1 missing in test)
fare_med = full_df.groupby('Pclass')['Fare'].transform('median')
full_df['Fare'].fillna(fare_med, inplace=True)
full_df['FarePerPerson'].fillna(full_df['Fare'] / full_df['FamilySize'], inplace=True)

# Age: fill with median age by Title and Pclass
age_medians = full_df.groupby(['Title', 'Pclass'])['Age'].median()
